alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Region Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 2:43PM MST until January 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Southern Gila Region Highlands/Black Range above 7000 feet. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Roads may close for brief periods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...lesser amounts of snow of 1 to 2 inches is possible below 7000 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Gila Region Highlands, Black Range
